item.title: Doris.nvim [Free]
item.description: A plugin for nvim (LazyVim) hosted open-source MIT licence. It’s quite a bit of a mix. Check here for details. I’m liking Lua, especially now I’m building something to help with my future experience with it. The repository also contains some dotfiles for some other tools and my nvim (LazyVim) dotfiles with a cmp example fetching autojump directories after typing a /. Easier after combining a few online tutorials, and a bit of hacking lua/config/complete.lua.
